definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: The fourth section analysis the literary work of people who walk into political field by examination.
sentences.chinese: 第四節分析評述科舉入仕之工商子弟的文學創作活動。

sentences.english: Analysis and comment are made on the floating cylinder sleeve method known in late years.
sentences.chinese: 對近幾年來發表的浮動缸套測量法進行了分析和評述。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter draws an outline of the influence of Florus.
sentences.chinese: 第四章評述弗羅魯斯在後世的影響和流傳情況。

sentences.english: The developing tendency of fiberoptic gyro is reviewed at last.
sentences.chinese: 最後，評述了光纖陀螺的發展趨勢。

sentences.english: The synthesis technologies of glycolic acid were reviewed, and the glycolic acid application was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 評述了的乙醇酸的合成方法，並介紹了其用途。

sentences.english: The second part will comment Lei Haizong's major works.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是雷海宗主要著作評述。

sentences.english: Progresses on synthesis method and structural properties of hierarchically ordered zeoli…
sentences.chinese: 並就製備方法和產品結構的特點進行了評述。

sentences.english: This paper have simple commentary about the problem in it.
sentences.chinese: 文中也對該方法存在的問題進行了分析和評述。

sentences.english: The questions about earthquake damage of communication equipments are also commented.
sentences.chinese: 並就通信設備震害預測問題做了簡單評述。

sentences.english: She had made these remarks offhandedly.
It also reviews the characteristics and relative problems of the Dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 並對《大詞典》的特點和有關問題作了評述。

sentences.english: This survey covers the data to mid-90.
sentences.chinese: 該評述包括九十年代中期以前的資料。

sentences.english: Notes on the new genera described by Chinese plant taxonomists in the last thirty years.
sentences.chinese: 評述三十年來我國種子植物分類學者所發表之新屬。

sentences.english: The diffusion controlled ledge growth mechanism of bainite (DCLGMB) is reviewed briefly in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 首先對貝氏體擴散控制檯階長大機制進行簡要評述。

sentences.english: This article aims survey some of the foreign reviews for chinese molybdenum industry.
sentences.chinese: 本文評述了國外對中國鉬業的一些說法。

sentences.english: The developments of high strength and toughness aluminum alloy are reviewed in this paper in detail.
sentences.chinese: 對高強高韌鋁合金的發展情況進行了全面的評述。

definition: study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
to comment/a point by point commentary
to speak bluntly (idiom)/not to mince words
variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
